Articles.Content: I'm just signed up to these forums and i was wondering what is the most common things talked about in what appears to be the off topic section of the websites and so i can get some insight so when i post something other than my first post i don't make a complete foll of myself or sound like an idiot. the only forum that I post on is the Minceaft forums so i assume that the off topic section is done a bit differently then on the Minecraft forums.
Look around and see what's talked about. Movies, science fiction, and space tech, for the most part.
